Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: jerome shouldeen
Reviews.Content: I like my product it is great,I am a very happy customer,all the features are fantastic and ezay to used.

Reviews.Title: Meh.
Reviews.Author: Molly
Reviews.Content: This camera won't stay charged long enough for me to decide what to think of it. The battery drains pretty quickly.The photo quality is satisfactory, but nothing to get excited about.Of course, it's attractive, small and convenient for an on-the-go camera. The flip screen is a great.Overall, though, this camera is not worth the price based on photo quality alone. Keep shopping.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: David Kochems
Reviews.Content: Great camera lives up to all expectations. I would buy this camera again.  A great buy for the "Grapher" on the go.

Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: Wendy Taylor
Reviews.Content: I am unable to review this product as I have not received it up to this time, I am very dissatisfied

ProductInfo.Features:
Macro, Macro Text (with grid), Macro Color, Tripod, Action, Fireworks
Adjustable LCD screen enables you to view and take great pictures from multiple angles.
16.1 Megapixel resolution with 5x Optical Zoom means your images and video will always have brilliant detail - from far away and any angle.
Access a host of creativity features on the brilliant 3" LCD touch screen display.
Dual Image Stabilization: Get brighter and more natural pictures, while also reducing the effects of image blur in lower light conditions
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Multiview MV800 16.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom White
